verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
In the crushing
In the pressing
You are making new wine

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
In the soil
I now surrender
You are breaking new ground

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
So I yield to You into Your careful hand
When I trust You I don't need to understand

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Make me Your vessel
Make me an offering
Make me whatever You want me to be
I came here with nothing
But all You have given me
Jesus bring new wine out of me

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
In the crushing
In the pressing
You are making new wine

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
In the soil
I now surrender
You are breaking new ground
You are breaking new ground

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
So, make me Your vessel
Make me an offering
Make me whatever
You want me to be
I came here with nothing
But all You have given me
Jesus, bring new wine out of me

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
'Cause where there is new wine
There is new power
There is new freedom
And the Kingdom is here
I lay down my old flames
To carry Your new fire today
